metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2816 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds Read in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.0212.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> the faulty method check_vim9_unlet was added in version 8.2.0601 with commit d72c1bf0a, so, versions earlier than that are not affected.

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
